definitions.example: He was given free rein to do whatever he wanted.

definitions.definition: Without; not containing (what is specified); exempt; clear; liberated.
definitions.example: We had a wholesome, filling meal, free of meat.  I would like to live free from care in the mountains.

definitions.definition: Ready; eager; acting without spurring or whipping; spirited.
Invested with a particular freedom or franchise; enjoying certain immunities or privileges; admitted to special rights; followed by of.
Certain or honourable; the opposite of base.
Privileged or individual; the opposite of common.
definitions.example: a free fishery;  a free warren
